instruction.value: Initial dose. Administer by direct injection.
May administer additional doses at an interval of 3 to 5 minutes as required, following initial dose.

AdditionalNotes.value: Anesthesia induction. Ideal body weight used for dose calculations. 10% of induction dose can be used to determine the patient's response to etomidate, especially in patients receiving other opioids or sedative/hypnotics. Elderley patients require lower doses.
